post.body:
What are hubs and how do they affect the data you can view? I can see there is `Sun Hub`, `Green Hub` or `Kaffie Hub` there. What are the difference between them?

I.e., if I took `Kaffie Hub` once, and now I've also downloaded the contents of `Sun Hub` - what difference there will be in data? Detailed answer would be awesome.

comment.body: It's all up to us to make ZN a bit more filled up with content :)

@Notime: So it means for "the whole picture to see" (all posts, all topics and all users), I will need to add to my local data all the hubs?

If I understand it right, each hub stores it's own chunk of data (user messages, i.e.), and that chunk of data is not available to me, if I am using another single hub?
@Kaffie: Kindly thanks for your reply, I've got my answer from there :)
Don't go into despair =) It will be eventually rehosted on some other git host, that don't have such foolish rules/laws/blah-blahs and other copyright poop.
